title: Short-Term Course for Theology Majors: Alleviating Foreign Language Reading Anxiety and Enhancing Reading Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension skills and understanding of fundamental theological terminology
context.additional_context: Project-based learning (PBL) applied to strengthen job relevance in mathematics for in-service practitioners, operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend theological English texts with over 80% accuracy and present summaries of key concepts at least three times
Learners can apply five or more reading strategies (skimming, scanning, etc.) contextually to complete text analysis within 20 minutes
Learners can establish a daily 30+ minute English reading habit and submit progress logs at least five times over one week

resources: Role card set for group discussion
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
